attributes.action: Allow Tenants to have their Housing Benefit paid by BACS into their Bank Accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the recent postal strikes there should be legislation to make sure that all local governments/councils should have a full BACS system set up for housing benefit to be paid directly into a tenant's bank account. This would surely be far more secure than risking having housing benefit cheques lying around in a sorting office or in transit.
